summary: Add logging capability to TodoStorage class for debugging and audit purposes. Logger level controlled by TODO_LOG_LEVEL environment variable (defaults to WARNING). load() and save() methods log DEBUG on success with file path and count, ERROR on failure. _ensure_parent_directory() logs DEBUG when creating directory, ERROR on failure.

verification.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_issue_2100_storage_logging.py

risks: Logger is cached globally in _logger module variable - may need reset in tests
